original_text: People say this: ‘If a person works to make his body strong and healthy, that will help him a little. But if a person works to live in a way that makes God happy, that will help him much more. It will help that person in his life now on earth. It will also help him in his future life with God in heaven.’
korean_text: 육체의 연단은 약간의 유익이 있으나 경건은 범사에 유익하니 금생과 내생에 약속이 있느니라

sentences.original_text: 'If a person works to make his body strong and healthy,
sentences.korean_translation: '만약 어떤 사람이 자신의 몸을 강하고 건강하게 만들기 위해 노력한다면,

sentences.original_text: that will help him a little.
But if a person works to live in a way that makes God happy,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 어떤 사람이 하나님을 기쁘시게 하는 방식으로 살기 위해 노력한다면,

sentences.original_text: that will help him much more.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그를 훨씬 더 도와줄 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: It will help that person in his life now on earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 지금 땅에서의 그 사람의 삶을 도와줄 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: It will also help him in his future life with God in heaven.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 또한 천국에서 하나님과 함께할 그의 미래 삶도 도와줄 것입니다.'
